question: What is the volume of cargo handled by Major ports in India in the year 2020?
explanation: In the year 2020, major ports in India handled 704.82 million tonnes (MT) of cargo traffic. It is at a CAGR of 2.74% during the lastÂ  5 years FY16-FY20. Cargo traffic at non-major ports reached 447.21 MT in the year 2020.
